Gets a number from the properties and sets up an appropriate cellular automaton rule based on that number.
RulePanel - Class in cellularAutomata.graphics
The tab that contains the rule and its description.
RulePanel(AllPanel) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.graphics.RulePanel
The panel containing the rule, and rule description.
RuleTree - Class in cellularAutomata.graphics
Creates a tree for selecting CA rules.
RuleTree(MouseListener) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.graphics.RuleTree
Creates a menu tree holding each of the CA rules.
run() - Method in class CellularAutomaton
This runs the cellular automaton.
RUNNING_AVERAGE - Static variable in class cellularAutomata.CurrentProperties
Key to the property that specifies how many generations to average when displaying cell values.
RUNNING_MESSAGE - Static variable in class cellularAutomata.graphics.AllPanelController
The message displayed while the simulation is running.
